content:
/>
V.iii.7.4.a
.
ED
ED is evaluated with a noncompensable evaluation under
38 CFR 4.115b, DC 7522
without regard to whether penile deformity is present.
Reference
:  For more information on evaluating deformity of the penis under the version of the rating schedule in effect prior to November 14, 2021, see
Williams v. Wilkie
, 30 Vet.App. 134 (2018).
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 7 - Genitourinary Disabilities
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 7, Section None
